hero.title: Web Developer & Designer
hero.description: I create beautiful, responsive websites with a focus on user experience. Let's collaborate to bring your ideas to life.

about.title: About Me
about.description1: I'm a passionate web developer and designer with a keen eye for detail and a love for creating beautiful, functional websites. With several years of experience in web development, I specialize in creating responsive, user-friendly websites that look great on any device.
about.description2: My journey in web development began when I discovered my passion for combining creativity with technical skills. I've since worked on various projects, from small business websites to complex web applications, always striving to deliver high-quality work that exceeds expectations.
about.description3: When I'm not coding, you'll find me exploring new design trends, learning new technologies, or enjoying outdoor activities. I believe in continuous learning and am always looking to expand my skill set.

list.title: Senior Frontend Developer
description: Led the development of the company's flagship SaaS product using React, NextJS, and TypeScript.
Implemented CI/CD pipelines and improved application performance by 40%.
Collaborated with UX designers to create intuitive and accessible user interfaces.
Mentored junior developers and conducted code reviews to ensure high code quality.

list.title: Full Stack Developer
description: Developed and maintained multiple web applications for clients in the finance and healthcare sectors.
Built RESTful APIs using Node.js, Express, and integrated with various database systems.
Implemented responsive designs and ensured cross-browser compatibility.
Participated in agile development processes and sprint planning.

list.title: Frontend Developer
description: Created responsive web interfaces for e-commerce and corporate clients.
Collaborated with the design team to implement pixel-perfect UI designs.
Optimized website performance and implemented SEO best practices.
Assisted in transitioning the company's development workflow to use modern JavaScript frameworks.

projects.title: Projects
projects.noProjects: No projects found in this category.

list.title: Portfolio Website

list.title: Weather App
list.description: A mobile app that provides real-time weather information using geolocation.

list.title: Brand Identity Design
list.description: Complete brand identity including logo, color palette, and brand guidelines.

list.title: Task Management App
list.description: A productivity app that helps users organize tasks and track progress.

list.title: Restaurant Website
list.description: A website for a restaurant with online ordering and reservation capabilities.

contact.title: Get In Touch
contact.description: I'm interested in freelance opportunities and collaborations. If you have a project that needs my expertise, or if you just want to say hi, feel free to reach out!
